context.flawed_solution:
#### 6
Across Monday through Friday, the total number of hours Harry sleeps is 8 + 7 + 8 + 7 = <<8+7+8+7=30>>30 hours
The total number of days from Monday through Friday is <<5=5>>5 days
The average number of hours Harry sleeps in one night is 30 / 5 = <<30/5=6>>6 hours
